'Assumption Iloilo' (also known as 'AC' or the 'Assumption Convent') is a
Catholic school in General Luna St., Iloilo City, Philippines. It was founded by
the Sisters of the Assumption in 1910. It offers preschool, grade school, and
high school education for males and females.
categories: Roman Catholic elementary schools in the Philippines
Roman Catholic secondary schools in the Philippines
